xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:DisclosureOfNotesOnFinancialR: Notes on ratios: n nNotes on ratios: n1. Debt equity ratio is 0.0019 however the utility rounds off the same to 0.002 automatically and hence actual ratio is provided in notes. n n2. Debt service coverage ratio is 72 which is computed as EBITDA / (Debt+ Interest service) n Since the utility does not accept this no., we have kept it blank and provided the same in notes. n n3. Interest service coverage ratio is 51.53, which is computed as EBIT/Interest . Since the utility does not accept this no., we have kept it blank and provided the same in notes. n n nNotes on results: n n nPlease refer notes submitted with the Quick Results.
xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:DescriptionOfOtherExpenses: Provision for doubtful deposits and advances
Provision for doubtful deposits and advances
xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:DisclosureOfNotesOnSegmentsEx: Operating segments are components of an enterprise for which discrete financial information is available that is evaluated regularly by the chief operating decision makers, in deciding how to allocate resources and assessing performance. The Group's chief operating decision makers are the Chief Executive Officer and the Chairman. n nThe Group reorganised itself into three business units from April 1, 2018, which form the operating segments for segment reporting. n nThe operating segments are: na. Technology Services nb. Alliance nc. Accelerite (Products) n nSegregation of assets (other than trade receivables), liabilities, depreciation and amortization and other non-cash expenses into various reportable segments have not been presented as the assets are used interchangeably between segments and the Group is of the view that it is not practical to reasonably allocate the other assets, liabilities and other non-cash expenses to individual segments and an ad-hoc allocation will not be meaningful.
